text:
ello ReiSuilane, [redacted_name] here.
I understand that playing a game can provide some distraction during difficult times. To receive the final reward, you must complete all tasks each day. Quick Wins reset every day at 1:00 PM UTC. Don‚Äôt forget to claim your Quick Wins rewards after completing them to ensure your points count towards your progress bar, even if you've been active that day, Quick Wins points won't be added automatically.
Regarding last week, since it has already passed, there is no way for us to revisit it. If you encounter any issues in the future, I kindly suggest reaching out to us so we can look into it and see how we can help resolve the problem. We want you to claim the final reward for this event, so I also recommend completing every task. If you encounter any issues, please report them to us right away.
Keep on rolling! üé≤ If you have any concern, do let us know on a new ticket, and we will assist you accordingly.
